A true hotel resort-Miami style development, described as not just a place to be, but rather an experience. The project features Miami themed hotel apartment building managed by SBE-Morgans Hotel Group, plus two residential apartment buildings.\xa0 Property details:\xa0 3 bedroom apartment on a mid\xa0 floor\xa0 overlooking Palm Jumeirah\xa0 *the unit situated on mid floor\xa0\xa0 *Open living layout / kitchen plan *Fully fitted & equipped kitchen \xa0 *Double glazed windows from floor to ceiling\xa0 *Natural stone flooring and walls finish Project highlights:\xa0 *Contemporary interiors & signature architecture *Two large\xa0beachfront\xa0infinity swimming pools *Easy road access - first roundabout on West Crescent road\xa0 *Luxurious spa\xa0*Dedicated kids swimming pool and playground *Gym,\xa0 *Upmarket restaurant *Day dining\xa0beachfront cafe\xa0 *Private beach access\xa0 *Grand lobby with concierge\xa0service and\xa0valet."]
